title: Tamron Hall quits NBC, refuses multi-million dollar contract to stay
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Tamron Hall quits NBC, refuses multi-million dollar contract to stay Tamron Hall is leaving NBC News and MSNBC when her contract expires this month, the network announced Wednesday Post to Facebook Tamron Hall quits NBC, refuses multi-million dollar contract to stay Tamron Hall is leaving NBC News and MSNBC when her contract expires this month, the network announced Wednesday Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/2jWDoPT Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address.
